statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -5 \\ -12 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -12 \\ -29 \\ 43 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -37 \\ 53 \\ 129 \\ -189 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
